data.title: Amazon's Jeff Bezos has promoted long-time AWS executive Peter DeSantis to his elite 'S-team'
data.text: DeSantis's promotion is a big stamp of approval by Bezos and Amazon's leadership team, signifying his rise in the ranks.

data.title: eBay Vs. Amazon: What's the Difference?
data.text: For sellers looking to sell some old stuff or make extra cash from online retailing, the decision to go online is easy but the choice between eBay versus Amazon might not be so easy.

data.title: Amazon Undercuts Google's Nest Hub With New Echo Show 5
data.text: Small and affordable wins the race.

data.title: Amazon will soon let you ask Alexa to delete your voice recordings — here's how
data.text: Amazon has been criticized for how it handles voice recording and transcripts.

data.title: Three Top E-Commerce Stocks to Buy Right Now.
data.text: eBay, JD.com, and Amazon should be on your shopping list.

data.title: Amazon adds ‘Alexa, delete what I said today’ command
data.text: Buried in the this morning’s Echo Show 5 announcement are a couple of new security features worth highlighting. In addition to the inclusion of a built-in camera shutter on the new smart display are a pair of Echo commands that let users delete voice recordings with an Alexa command.

data.title: Amazon just launched its cheapest Echo with a screen
data.text: Amazon announced the Echo Show 5 on Wednesday for $89.99.

data.title: Amazon just launched a $90, 5.5-inch Echo Show
data.text: Amazon just announced a 5.5-inch Echo Show model with a $90 price tag, and I’d be remiss if I didn’t mention right out of the gate how much the thing looks like that new Google Assistant-sporting Smart Clock. These things happen, of course.

data.title: There's a new biggest Amazon bull on Wall Street, who sees the stock surging 50% in a year
data.text: Pivotal's Michael Levine sees Amazon worth $1.3 trillion in 12 months.

data.title: Take Advantage of This Recent Weakness in Amazon Stock
data.text:
Amazon stock dropped big as trade tensions rose, but trade issues related to Amazon are grossly overstated.
